pr_title: Improve TestPassiveSTS.java to test sign-out and for tenant mode

timeline.message: Improve TestPassiveSTS.java to test sigout and for tenant mode

timeline.bodyText: Better to rename the method to something like appendTenantDomainQueryParam or something along the line.
timeline.author: mefarazath

timeline.bodyText: Is asserting the status enough to gurantee a successful logout?
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: After a successful logout, an empty response will be redirected to the client's reply URL. Then an authentication request will be sent by the client. So we can't test any content. So have added the logic to verify the existence of sessionDataKey in the response
replies.author: Abilashini

timeline.bodyText:
I feel it would be better to include what we expected to happen here.
"Authentication request was not initiated after logout from sample. Possible logout failure."
timeline.author: mefarazath

replies.bodyText: In addition to the current message.
